title: BRIEF-Arafura Resources Signs Additional MoU For Supply Of Rare Earth Products
text:
BRIEF-Arafura Resources Signs Additional MoU For Supply Of Rare Earth Products

Commodities 2 hours ago (Sep 24, 2019 09:21)

BRIEF-Arafura Resources Signs Additional MoU For Supply Of Rare Earth Products Sept 24 (Reuters) - Arafura Resources Ltd : * SIGNED ADDITIONAL MOU FOR SUPPLY OF RARE EARTH PRODUCTS FROM NOLANS NEODYMIUM-PRASEODYMIUM PROJECT IN NORTHERN TERRITORY * MOU IS WITH BAOTOU TIANHE MAGNETICS TECHNOLOGY CO * MOU ALLOWS FOR LONG-TERM SALE OF NDPR OXIDE FROM NOLANS * ARAFURA PLANS TO PRODUCE AN AVERAGE OF 4,357 TONNES OF NDPR OXIDE PER ANNUM FOR 23-YEAR OPERATIONAL LIFE OF PROJECT

BRIEF-Arafura Resources Signs Additional MoU For Supply Of Rare Earth Products
description: BRIEF-Arafura Resources Signs Additional MoU For Supply Of Rare Earth Products
